Sorry SoulStice. I saw that you posted, and I figured you read all 
your mail by then. I read all my mail before posting, so its an easy 
assumption for me to make.

::Zardus::

Zardus tries to dodge the shot, but it hits him in the shoulder, 
completely disabling his movement mechanism in that area. His gun 
drops to the ground, Zardus growling as he picks it up again.

"Follow their leader," he says over his comm-link, flying into the 
air and firing at Deemos as he flies after the bot.
